title: Who's your favorite Youtuber?
body:
Yes, this is sorta in response to the Markiplier thread, but it got locked. (Edit: Just found out it was a necro, lol)

My personal favorite is Cryaotic. He keeps everything real, hardly ever screams, and is the one LPer I can think of whose voice actually enhances the experience. 

If you're not too interested in a game, yet you'd like to get the experience for yourself, check his channel to see if that game's on there. Odds are he has if it's a cinematic game such as Heavy Rain and The Last Of Us.
